holidays.title: Curling Is Cool Day
holidays.description: Get your shoes and sticks ready as we celebrate one of the coolest sports in history.

holidays.title: Defender of the Fatherland Day
holidays.description: Join us in honoring the bravery of Russia's defenders, its history, and its rich traditions.

holidays.title: Diesel Engine Day
holidays.description: Gear yourselves up as we celebrate one of the world’s most important automotive power sources.

holidays.title: Emperor's Birthday Japan
holidays.description: Pull out your Japanese attire and flags as we celebrate the great emperor of Japan!

holidays.title: Guyana Republic Day
holidays.description: Prepare for some interesting history lessons as we explore the fascinating story of Guyana.

holidays.title: International Stand Up to Bullying Day
holidays.description: International Stand Up to Bullying Day is a part of Anti-Bullying Week.

holidays.title: National Banana Bread Day
holidays.description: Few things are as comforting as the smell of a freshly baked loaf of banana bread.

holidays.title: National Day Brunei
holidays.description: Gear up to celebrate Brunei and its people on their National Day!

holidays.title: National Dog Biscuit Day
holidays.description: Your dog doesn’t to play fetch, or a pat. What he really wants is his biscuit!

holidays.title: National Play Tennis Day
holidays.description: Grab your rackets and get on the court as we celebrate the best of tennis!

holidays.title: National Rationalization Day
holidays.description: National Rationalization Day allows people to rationalize as much as they wish to.

holidays.title: National Rudy Day
holidays.description: Call up all the Rudys you know; celebrate with them as they mark their special day.

holidays.title: National Tile Day
holidays.description: Get ready to know why National Tile Day is an important day worthy of celebration.

holidays.title: National Tootsie Roll Day
holidays.description: Tootsie Rolls are delicious, chewy candies enjoyed by people of all ages.

holidays.title: Pinocchio Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Disney’s iconic film “Pinocchio” this Pinocchio Day

holidays.title: Skip the Straw Day
holidays.description: We can slurp more down by just going straight for the glass’s edge anyway!

holidays.title: World Peace and Understanding Day
holidays.description: Get ready to set aside this day to live peacefully and celebrate organizations championing goodwill.

holidays.title: Yukon Heritage Day
holidays.description: Binging the history and culture of the smallest of Canada’s three territories to the forefront.

holidays.title: Dakota Fanning’s Birthday
holidays.description: As the youngest S.A.G. nominee in history, Fanning’s name stands out like a star.

holidays.title: Desiree Montoya’s Birthday
holidays.description: The journey has just begun for this talented social media star and influencer.

holidays.title: Emily Blunt’s Birthday
holidays.description: From stage plays to high-profile films, this award-winning actress’s career continues to rise!
